Although in the shade, the person is no different from a normal person, but in fact, the Ren Chakra is damaged.

Name.Value: "Ren Chakra"-30

ItemDescription.Value: This poison is transmitted from the Miao border, a variety of poisonous insects together in a jar sealed up, so that they kill each other, after a year, the only one left in the form of silkworm, golden skin, so called the golden silkworm compulsion. If accidentally infected with this poison, tendons and bones will be greatly affected, serious cases will not be able to move.

Name.Value: "Muscle" -50

ItemDescription.Value: Red letter paste, similar to heliotrope, is taken from red letter stone. The difference is that the purity of red letter paste is higher and the toxicity is heavier. Anyone who contaminates or accidentally ingests it will suffer from breathing disorders and leg problems.

Name.Value: "Breathing" -40 "Qi Purity" -40

ItemDescription.Value: Drunken Immortal Spirit is made from the combination of Drunken Immortal Spirit Flower and Pangolin Wood. It is a kind of narcissus-like flower, which is not poisonous in itself, but after mixing with the fragrance of pangolin wood, it becomes highly poisonous. If you accidentally inhale this poison, you will be confused and disoriented.

Name.Value: "Focus"-50 "Calmness"-50 "Decisiveness"-50

ItemDescription.Value: The exact method of preparation is not known. Although the poisoned person can take care of his own food and living, but the Ren pulse is greatly affected, resulting in a dull face, stagnant eyes, confusion and few words, preferring yin to yang, loss of will and dementia.

Name.Value: "Ren Chakra"-60

ItemDescription.Value: The Golden Crow is a divine bird, which later became an alias for the sun. The way this poison is made is unknown, the poisonous pellet is golden in color and has no smell. Those who consume it will instantly disrupt their breath and lose their qi.

Name.Value: "Breath Adjustment"-60 "Qi Method"-60

ItemDescription.Value: It is a secret elixir that completely disrupts the fixed capital and strengthens the element. Just one can make the person who consumes it sluggish, unstable in the lower plate, and never able to walk normally again.

Name.Value: "Lower hand" -40 "Qi Purity" -40

ItemDescription.Value: Miaojiang poison. The only surviving centipede will have condensed the rest of its soul, which will be dried and crushed into powder. The poisoned person will have a damaged Du Chakra and his Yang martial arts power will be greatly reduced.

Name.Value: "Du Chakra" -35

ItemDescription.Value: A poisonous wine made from the flowers and leaves of the Lei Gong Vine. It has a very faint grassy smell when smelled carefully, and tastes like ordinary white wine, with a spicy aftertaste. The poisoned person will not be able to concentrate and will be in a trance and easily frightened.

Name.Value: "Focus"-30 "Calmness"-30

ItemDescription.Value: Originated from Yunnan, it is a widely used painkiller for bruises and injuries in Sichuan. However, it is very toxic and can be used properly to cure illnesses, while misuse or overdose may lead to loss of internal strength and death in serious cases.

Name.Value: "Qi Capacity" -40

ItemDescription.Value: It is commonly known as "Broken Gut Grass" and resembles honeysuckle, which is often mistakenly eaten and killed. The poisonous pills made from the flowers will make the poisoned person weak-minded and easily irritated.

Name.Value: "Will"-60

Name.ValueInfo: <color=#FF9A00FF> Poison your whole family to explode </color>

Name.Value: "Qi Capacity" -20

ItemDescription.Value: A high grade pill with a jasper emerald color throughout, which can detoxify Yang poison. It smells like the fragrance of orchids.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yang" poison from the body by "detoxification"

ItemDescription.Value: A pill made from twelve taels each of the stamens of gardenia, white magnolia, pear, and white peony flowers. With these four spring blooming white flowers into the medicine, there is melting winter snow, everything revives the symbolic meaning, can solve Yang poison.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yang" poison from the body by "detoxification"

ItemDescription.Value: The ice clear molten venom itself is toxic, taken from the bile and venom of a snake that does not hibernate in Miaojiang. But this yin poison can be used as an antidote to lift some yang poison by attacking it with poison.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yang" poison from the body by "detoxification"

ItemDescription.Value: Also known as the eye of beauty, it is said to be made from the green lotus held in the hands of Manjushri Bodhisattva, which itself has an extremely strong aroma and is particularly rare, and can detoxify Yang.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yang" poison from the body by "detoxification"

ItemDescription.Value: The Protector of the Soul and Heart Pill, which combines a large number of blood-replenishing and yin-nourishing herbs, can effectively restore the mind and heart of the poisoned person, allowing the poisoned person to wake up from delirium and regain consciousness. The whole body is red in color, because the elixir contains a heavy calming and tranquilizing vermilion.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yang" poison from the body by "detoxification"

Name.ValueInfo: <color=#FF9A00FF> The four qi pills of the virulent female </color>

ItemDescription.Value: Medicines have four different medicinal properties: cold, hot, warm and cool, called the four qi. The Lie Maiden Four Qi Pill combines four different medicinal properties of top quality herbs into one, making this medicine not only mild, but also able to dissolve all kinds of poisons.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yang" poison from the body by "detoxification"

ItemDescription.Value: Yuanyang is the fire of the destiny gate, which is the key to regulating the balance of the five elements in the body. This elixir can dissolve general yin poison.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yin" poison from the body by "detoxification"

ItemDescription.Value: Yuanyang is the fire of the life gate and is the key to regulating the balance of the five elements in the body. The method of preparation and the effect of the medicine are similar to that of the Yuan Yang Pill, except that this medicine is in powder form.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yin" poison from the body by "detoxification"

ItemDescription.Value: The heart-clearing pills are generally made from yellow lily, which is not rare in itself. However, the pills are made from the yellow lily that grows in the crevices of the Kunlun Mountains, which is not only scarce, but also has steep walls, so it is rare to collect one.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yin" poison from the body by "detoxification"

ItemDescription.Value: Golden Jade Pill, concocted from saffron, Centella asiatica and Petunia asiatica, is a household name for antidotes to fetal toxicity. Although common, it is not expensive and has a miraculous effect on detoxifying Yin poison.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yin" poison from the body by "detoxification"

ItemDescription.Value: Shennong tasted all kinds of herbs in order to save the sick, and finally passed away due to tasting Broken Gut Herb. According to legend, this medicine has the effect of bringing Shennong back to life, so it is called Shennong's rejuvenating elixir.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yin" poison from the body by "detoxification"

Name.ValueInfo: <color=#FF9A00FF> The Golden Elixir of Barrier Breaking </color>

ItemDescription.Value: Most of the time, the Barrier Breaker Golden Pill is a tonic used by martial arts masters to break through their martial arts limits, and very few people are willing to take it to cure poison. However, as an antidote, the Golden Pill of Barrier Breaking can turn all Yin poisons into invisible.

Name.Value: Remove the "Yin" poison from the body by "detoxification"
